Terms & Conditions

Spooktacular Slot Tournament

  1. The promotion runs 25 - 31 October 2024.
  2. Players listed in the leaderboard are members of Mr Slot, Mr Mobi, Hippozino, Mr SuperPlay, Casimboo, Royalzee, MaxiPlay, Jazzy Spins, Vegas Paradise, Jackpot Paradise, Dukes Casino, BetDukes and Mr JackVegas who have deposited at least once and are over the age of 18.
  3. Play on progressive jackpot games does not contribute towards wagering.
  4. Only real bets count toward the wagering and at the end of the promotional period, the players with the highest wagering on the qualifying games will win cash prizes.
  5. In total, 50 players will be rewarded with a cash credit. For every £/€/$ 1 wagered on any of our slot games, the player will receive 1 point towards the leaderboard ranking.
    a. 1st Placed - £150
    b. 2nd – 10th Placed - £50
    c. 11th – 50th Placed - £10
  6. Cash prizes will be awarded within 7 days to the player’s account after the conclusion of the promotion.
  7. Player must be eligible to receive bonuses.

General Terms & Conditions:

  1. The promotion is not available to customers depositing with Skrill payment method.
  2. All active bonuses or pending bonuses and promotional offers, and any winnings generated through the wagering of either of the aforementioned, will be cancelled upon withdrawal request if any of the applicable conditions have not been met in full prior to withdrawal request being submitted.
  3. You cannot withdraw any Bonus Funds from your Bonus Balance. Once the wagering requirement has been fully met, the Bonus amount and the Bonus Winnings will be converted to the Real Balance. Any funds on the Real Balance can be cashed out at any time.
  4. We reserve the right to alter this chapter, cancel, modify or suspend any offer and any promotion at any time and without prior notice – in respect of any Bonus that has yet to be provided to You. Nothing in this section limits any other right and/or remedy granted to Us.
  5. The Promotion is subject to our Terms & Conditions.

Deposit Offer

  1. The offer is valid between the 31st October and 1st November 2024 for players who have deposited at least once since registration.
  2. Deposit a minimum of 10 Euros (or an equivalent value of 10 euros in other acceptable currency) to get 20 free spins on Helloween & 200% Bonus up to £40 by using deposit code: HALLOWEEN.
  3. The bonus can be claimed once during the promotional period.
  4. Bonus or any winnings from the free spins must be wagered 50 times before a withdrawal may be made. Wagering contributions apply and vary from game to game.
  5. Any bonus and winnings will expire 2 days after being credited from the date and time it is credited to a player's account. Players who have not used their bonus and winnings generated from the bonus or if the Wagering Requirement has not been met within the stipulated time limits shall not be able to receive the expired bonus and/or winnings generated from the bonus thereafter.
  6. Match Deposit Offer:
    Once the amount you have wagered meets or exceeds the Wagering Requirement, the Promotion will end and your Bonus Funds will automatically transfer to your Real Money Balance (up to the Maximum Conversion Amount of 3X time(s) the original bonus amount credited to your account) from where you will be able to withdraw them as cash or continue to use them in non-Promotion play.
  7. Free Spins Offer:
    Once the amount you have wagered meets or exceeds the Wagering Requirement, the Promotion will end and your Bonus Funds will automatically transfer to your Real Money Balance (up to the Maximum Conversion Amount of {#CURRENCY} 20) from where you will be able to withdraw them as cash or continue to use them in non-Promotion play.
  8. The promotion is not available to customers depositing with Skrill & Neteller payment method.
  9. All active bonuses or pending bonuses and promotional offers, and any winnings generated through the wagering of either of the aforementioned, will be cancelled upon withdrawal request if any of the applicable conditions have not been met in full prior to withdrawal request being submitted.
  10. You cannot withdraw any Bonus Funds from your Bonus Balance. Once the wagering requirement has been fully met, the Bonus amount and the Bonus Winnings will be converted to the Real Balance. Any funds on the Real Balance can be cashed out at any time.
